text: Volvo Ocean 14 is the class of Volvo Ocean Race yachts that will be built for the 14th edition of the Race. It is being designed by Guillaume Verdier and will be built by Persico Marine. It is expected to feature foiling technology. It replaces the Volvo Ocean 65 which is designed to last 2 editions of the race. ==References== ==External links== *Volvo Ocean Race – Official site *Volvo Ocean Race Press Information – Press releases etc. Category:Sailing yachts * Category:Development sailing classes
title: Volvo Ocean 14
